EmailTemplate.name: 4_20_2015 April Turboticker.Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: The Turboticker: Cloud & Virtualization Lessons You'll Love
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cloud & Virtualization Lessons You’ll Love Take control of your cloud and virtual environments Best Practices for vCPU to CPU Ratio Management Matt Ray, Sales Engineer at VMTurbo, discusses what is the best vCPU to CPU ratio to assure performance in your environment—he asks, “What’s the real goal here?” Read More... <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vcpu-to-cpu-ratio-management?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickerapril&utm_content=042415>
How to Successfully Virtualize Business Critical Applications Mastering the intricacies of virtualizing business-critical applications is crucial to today’s IT organizations. This whitepaper explores key issues, practical barriers, and offers best practices for teams taking on this task. Read More... <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickerapril&utm_content=042415>
Planting a Tree for Every Demo Data centers consume more energy than ever before. You can change that. Maximizing efficiency in virtual and cloud environments saves energy: the more efficiently you use your infrastructure, the less energy you need to keep things running. For the month following Earth Day, VMTurbo pledges to plant a tree for each product demo completed. Schedule a demo today! Watch the Video to Learn More... <http://vmturbo.com/earthday?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=earthday-2015&utm_content=042215>
